sourcesContent:
Create Workout





Created Workouts:

  • {{workout.sets}} sets of {{workout.repetitions}} reps at {{workout.weight}} kg ({{workout.setType}})
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-workout', templateUrl: './create-workout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-workout.component.css'] }) export class CreateWorkoutComponent { sets = 0; repetitions = 0; weight = 0; setType = 'warmup'; workouts: any[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.loadWorkouts(); } loadWorkouts() { this.http.get('/api/workouts').subscribe((workouts) => { this.workouts = workouts; }); } onSubmit() { const newWorkout = { sets: this.sets, repetitions: this.repetitions, weight: this.weight, setType: this.setType, }; this.http.post('/api/workouts', newWorkout).subscribe((response: any) => { this.workouts.push(response); this.sets = 0; this.repetitions = 0; this.weight = 0; this.setType = 'warmup'; }); } }
